@description.name: @description
@description.body:
A form widget which allows a single selection. Looks somewhat like a normal button, but opens a list of items to select when tapping on it. Keep in mind that the SelectBox widget has always a selected item (due to the single selection mode). Right after adding the first item a changeSelection event is fired. 

 var selectBox = new qx.ui.form.SelectBox();
 selectBox.addListener("changeSelection", function(e) {

 });

 selectBox.add(new qx.ui.form.ListItem("Item 1"));

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: atom {qx.ui.basic.Atom} shows the text and icon of the content
@childControl.description: shows the text and icon of the content

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: arrow {qx.ui.basic.Image} shows the arrow to open the popup
@childControl.description: shows the arrow to open the popup

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the list items for the selection.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns if the selection could be empty or not.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true If selection could be empty, false otherwise.
@return.description: true If selection could be empty, false otherwise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for changeSelection.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the icon inside the list to match the selected ListItem.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the label inside the list to match the selected ListItem.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Listener method for "pointerover" event

  • Adds state "hovered"
  • Removes "abandoned" and adds "pressed" state (if "abandoned" state is set)

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Listener method for "pointerout" event

  • Removes "hovered" state
  • Adds "abandoned" and removes "pressed" state (if "pressed" state is set)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Toggles the popup's visibility.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Forwards key event to list widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of currently selected items. Note: The result is only a set of selected items, so the order can differ from the sequence in which the items were added.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Replaces current selection with the given items.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.
@throws.description: if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clears the whole selection at once.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects whether the given item is currently selected.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.
@throws.description: if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the selection is empty.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns all elements which are selectable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
all {Boolean} true for all selectables, false for the
   selectables the user can interactively select
@param.description:
true for all selectables, false for the
   selectables the user can interactively select

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Tries to set the selection using the given array containing the representative models for the selectables.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of the selected models.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Array} An array containing the models of the currently selected
   items.
@return.description:
An array containing the models of the currently selected
   items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the field model value. Should also update the UI.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var|null} Updates the field with the new model value.
@param.description: Updates the field with the new model value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{null|Error} Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).
@return.description:
Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the model value to its initial value. Should also update the UI.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a consistent and up-to-date model value. Note: returned value can also be a promise of type Promise<*|null>.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var|null} The model value plain or as promise.
@return.description: The model value plain or as promise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for changeSelected event on single selection manager.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the selection manager if it is already exists, otherwise creates the manager.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for the selection change of the including class e.g. SelectBox, List, â€¦ It sets the new modelSelection via {@link #setModelSelection}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Listener for the change of the internal model selection data array.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the enabled state of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current set enabled state.
